text: "Raging Abe Simpson and His Grumbling Grandson in "The Curse of the Flying Hellfish"" is the 22nd episode of The Simpsons 7th season. It was first broadcast on the Fox network on April 28, 1996. == Other websites == * * * Category:The Simpsons (season 7) episodes Category:1996 television episodes
title:
Raging Abe Simpson and His Grumbling Grandson in "The Curse of the Flying
Hellfish"
